newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico's TIIE 28-day rate falls to 19.615 pct.
newsitem.headline: Mexico's TIIE 28-day rate falls to 19.615 pct.

text.p: Mexico's 28-day interbank interest rate for Tuesday, July 29, was fixed at 19.615 percent, or 11.5 basis points less than 19.73 percent, the rate for July 28, Banco de Mexico said on Monday.

The 28-day TIIE is a market-weighted average interbank rate that is revised each working day, and is valid for the day after it is set. The new rate will be published in Tuesday's edition of the Mexican government's Official Gazette.
